Feline2::

She heard his transmission and stopped running. She stood for a 
moment to catch her breath. "Why do you want to reprogram me? You 
want to remove my program, and then what? Remove me too? You changed 
sides right there infront of me? And then your FRIENDS want me 
killed. They wanted to roast my carrcas on a spit.  How do I know 
that you won't just turn me over to them? I feel something for you 
HotRod. But I don't want to be killed."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He ran out of the base. He opened a comm to her.
> "You mis understood me. I'm not going to fully reprogram you.
> I just thought that if I removed that program you could make a 
honest
> decision. As long as you have that program, you cant make this 
decision
> base on what you truely want."
> He hoped she would understand what he was saying, He only wanted to 
help
> her.
